sections.heading: for lease or sale of lands; specific performance
sections.text: Nothing contained in sections 36-103 to 36-106 shall be construed to abridge the powers of a court of equity to compel the specific performance of agreements in cases of part performance.SourceR.S.1866, c. 43, ยง 65, p. 293;R.S.1913, ยง 2626;C.S.1922, ยง

sections.heading: and continues practice of equity decreeing specific performance when contract partly is performed to prevent fraud and injustice
sections.text: Includes contracts to devise. Cobb v. Macfarland, 87 Neb. 408, 127 N.W. 377 (1910).
